title: @KateyKhaos I heard somewhere you like Kog'Maw.
body:
Or was it you? I'm not sure. Anyways, I think you'll enjoy this skin idea.

_**Butterfly Catcher Thresh**_

His lantern is replaced with a butterfly net people jump into (perfect for Monarch Kog'Maw ADC) with his scythe being a pair of binoculars on a strap. He'd be wearing summertime clothes, with a straw hat, flower shirt and cargo shorts. And the best part? Souls at replaced with little butterflies that he can go around and catches.

What's not to love?

replies.body:
I do like Koggles, he's adorable. :3 

I looooove this idea! If they're on the same team, he can catch him in his net (if he actually remembers to click the damn lantern). I do like the idea of butterflies as souls. Inb4 he ults and it's a butterfly garden.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pqA9Hbw0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-05T17:25:18.259+0000)
>
> I do like Koggles, he's adorable. :3 
> 
> I looooove this idea! If they're on the same team, he can catch him in his net (if he actually remembers to click the damn lantern). I do like the idea of butterflies as souls. Inb4 he ults and it's a butterfly garden.

Heck yeah! Would be really neat if there were special interactions if Butterfly Catcher Thresh caught Monarch Kog'Maw in his neat, maybe a quote or special animation. I'm glad you like the idea tho.
I really like the idea. One concern though, wouldn't it be too close to the "Pool Party" line? LeeSin especially, has pretty much the outfit you're describing for Thresh, no?

> [{quoted}](name=DeathBurs7,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pqA9Hbw0,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-05T17:52:03.780+0000)
>
> I really like the idea. One concern though, wouldn't it be too close to the "Pool Party" line? LeeSin especially, has pretty much the outfit you're describing for Thresh, no?

I think it would definitely be possible to differentiate between the two, I definitely agree but with this you'd definitely want to try and make it seem more spring themed instead of summer.
Still think that this is a great idea that should definitely be considered :^)
